Juan Carlos Muñoz-Mora

Lecture 2

14 Nov 2016

General Idea

We will introduce the basic vector GIS concepts and operations. In particular, we will discuss: spatial join, intersection, union, among others.

Readings

Despite other papers will be presented, we will replicate together the following paper:

  • Stelios Michalopoulos and Elias Papaioannou, (2013). National Institutions and Subnational Development in Africa. The Quarterly Journal of Economics (2014) 129 (1): 151-213. doi: 10.1093/qje/qjt029

Please, have a look on the GIS strategy followed by the authors.

Main Articles Cited during the presentation

  • Stelios Michalopoulos and Elias Papaioannou, (2013). National Institutions and Subnational Development in Africa. The Quarterly Journal of Economics (2014) 129 (1): 151-213. doi: 10.1093/qje/qjt029
  • Tufte, T. (2001). The Visual Display of Quantitative Information - General
  • Data visualization with python & JavaScript - Kyral Dale (2016)
  • Alberto Alesina, Stelios Michalopoulos, and Elias Papaioannou. Journal of Political Economy (2016) 124:2, 428-488 Ethnic Inequality
  • Janet Currie and Matthew Neidell. The Quarterly Journal of Economics (2005) 120 (3): 1003-1030. Air Pollution and Infant Health: What Can We Learn from California’s Recent Experience?
